ParameterFields.Name: Behavior Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Determines the message to display. The Ho-Ho at Link's Oasis checks if the Big Octo was defeated, and the one on Outset Island checks if the stone head blocking Savage Labyrinth was destroyed. The Ho-Ho at Two-Eye Reef checks the disable spawn switch.

ParameterFields.Name: Disable Spawn Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Only checked for the Two-Eye reef Ho-Ho.
